item.title: VMware Explore 2025
item.description:
Viva Las Vegas - A kind of travelogue.

At the beginning of the year, I had the pleasure of flying to the USA, and now I’m on my way to Las Vegas. After a slightly delayed departure, I arrived in Vegas after an 11.5-hour flight in a “comfortable” 40 degrees Celsius or 104 degrees Fahrenheit, for those who do not use the metric system. Perhaps one more small note. I won’t write much about the sessions; anyone who wants to can look them up in William Lam’s repository. I want to focus more on the vibe of the event hereâ€”that is, I’ll try to. I’m not really a travel blogger.
